Description: Brighton Cleveland Circle top floor 2 bedroom currently undergoing renovations for an 8/1 move in! Sunny unit features open kitchen/living/dining room with hardwood floors throughout! Heat and hot water included. Common laundry in the building. Brand new kitchen cabinets, appliances, counters and bathroom vanity currently being installed and the whole unit is being painted! Great location next to Boston College, the Chestnut Hill Reservoir and the T!
